name: Wolf Ridge
description:
Wolf Ridge is a stunning asymmetrical survival game developed with community feedback at every corner. You and up to 7 other players will enter the picturesque mountain of Wolf Ridge, only to be hunted relentlessly by a tribal clan. You must fight tooth and nail to escape into the evacuation helicopter and make it back home.

Some highlights:

-Dynamic game-play, each round will be different from the last.

-Content-rich and a thoughtfully-designed 16-kilometer map full of unique locations such as cabins, crashed airplanes, watchtowers, and much more.

-Robust and unique tribal AI system.

-Teamwork, you won't escape unless you work as a team!




The mountains await survivor. Can you survive Wolf Ridge?
